title: aruT-tivilai
sahitya:
aruT-tivilai irundAl ennai Adi vyAdigaL enna sheyyum unad-


anupallavi

  iruT-paDalam onru shErndAl shuDar iraviyai en sheyyum aiyA unad-


caraNam    caraNa bhakthi irundAl cancalam endanai aNugumO candrashEkharA
karuNai irundAl kavalai azhindiDum kayilai nAyakA kaN pArttaruL unran
